snippet.title: Jon Shafer's At the Gates - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
At the Gates is an indie strategy game from Jon Shafer, designer of Civilization 5.
AtG will be released on January 23rd, 2019. Wishlist it now on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/241000

You are a dark age lord building a kingdom to replace the crumbling Roman Empire. Manage your clans, explore the landscape around you, harvest its resources, and build a mighty economic and military machine.
